name: Sir Grant-A-Lot's Defense
description:
Sir Grant-A-Lot has lived in his village for a long time, and now a dragon is threatening everything he loves. If he is to survive, he must force the dragon to leave!

Sir Grant-A-Lot's Defense is a hybrid of resource management and tower defense! Build ballistae to defend against the dragon, douse the buildings in water, and repair the damages! Make sure you remember to grab more water, you've only got two buckets!

Target platform: Mobile
Release plans: App store, Play store

This game is a student project that has gone through many artistic adventures. To learn more about this project, please feel free to visit the site at: nothinghereyet.no!

PC Controls:
E: Douse buildings when nearby
F: Repair Buildings when nearby
X: Build crossbows anywhere
